name: Neon Race - Light Bike Race
description:
Play the New Neon Race, No Battle Rules, Kill All. Neon Race Is the Most Beautiful and Addictive Race, Battle, Action, and Survival Game. Get Ready for the Most Exciting Race of Your Life. Neon Race! Race with Different Models of Neon Bikes on the Neon World.

Pick Your Favorite Neon Bike and Enjoy the Ride Throughout Lots of Neon Buildings, Mountains, and Hills. Play in Different Worlds, Lighten Up with Different Colors.

Your Goal Is Simple! Drive Your Light Bike Through Cyberspace Leaving a Light Trail Behind You in Heated Battles! Eliminate All Your Opponents While Avoiding Bumping Other Rider Trails, While Driving at the Speed of Light!

Whether You’re Bold or Careful, Outwit Your Opponents by Finding the Best Strategy to Destroy Them Before They Destroy You. Stay Cautious, You Have a Weak Point - Your Whole Bike. If You Ever Drive into a Wall or Another Opponent's Trail, Your Dead!


features
- Simple Controls
- Nice Sounds and Music.
- Great Gameplay.
- Make Insane Stunts!
- Try to Reach the Maximum Score.
- Different Neon Color Bikes.
